title: ValidationError
description: Standardized validation error payload returned by APIs and validation middleware.

error_id.description: Unique id to trace this validation error.

details.description: Optional additional details for debugging; should not contain PII when returned to clients.

fields.description: Fields affected by the validation error.

reasons.description: List of rule_ids or human reasons why the field was rejected.

suggestion.description: Optional suggestion to fix the problem.

request_id.description: Correlation ID for the incoming request.
